name: Farmer Tycoon
description:
The aim of the game is to plant crops, harvest them and sell them, but be careful of diseases, they will destroy your crops. Use farmers to help you along the way.

You can't save the game at the moment (sorry, I'm working on it though)

Controls are:

WASD - walk around

Shift - run

Left click - Harvest

Right click - Plant/cancel hiring farmers

Esc - pause

E - exit silo/market menus
